Key Match Events: Chris Flexen pitched 6.1 innings with 5 hits, 0 earned runs, 7 strikeouts, and 1 walk.
Andrew Vaughn singled to left, scoring Fletcher and Vargas, with Robert Jr. advancing to second.
Lenyn Sosa doubled to right, scoring Vaughn and Robert Jr., with Sosa advancing to third.
Bryan Ramos singled to left, scoring Sosa.
Zach DeLoach doubled to left, scoring Ramos.
David Fletcher singled to left, scoring DeLoach.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Chicago White Sox averted a record-breaking loss for the third straight day, beating the Los Angeles Angels 7-0.
The game took place at Rate Field in Chicago, Illinois, with an attendance of 15,678.
The game lasted 2 hours and 30 minutes.
